pages.text: $(li)The Wooden Pickaxe is the most basic Pickaxe that you can create.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted placing a pair of Wood Planks and Sticks in a Crafting Table.
$(li)You can mine basic block like Stone, Coal, Nether Quartz Ore, Nether Gold Ore, End Crystal Ore, or Biotite Ore with this pickaxe.
